shows.title: Sonnie's Edge
shows.description: In a dystopian cyberpunk future, a scarred and traumatized young woman who partakes in gruesome death matches where engineered beasts mercilessly tear each other apart for sport to entertain the sadistic, rich and powerful is seduced by the mistress of a sinister man who bet on her beast.

comments.comment: This is by far my favorite episode!

shows.title: Three Robots
shows.description: Long after the fall of humanity, three robots embark on a sightseeing tour of a post-apocalyptic city

shows.title: The Witness
shows.description: After seeing a brutal murder, a woman flees from the killer through the streets of a surreal city.

shows.title: Suits
shows.description: A community of farmers use their homemade mechs to defend their families from an alien invasion.

shows.title: Sucker of Souls
shows.description: Unleashed by an archaeological dig, a bloodthirsty demon battles a team of mercenaries armed with... cats?

shows.title: When the Yogurt Took Over
shows.description: After scientists accidentally breed super-intelligent yogurt, it soon hungers for world domination.

shows.title: Beyond the Aquila Rift
shows.description: Awakening after traveling light years off course, a ship's crew struggles to discover just how far they've come.

shows.title: Good Hunting
shows.description: The son of a spirit hunter forges a bond with a shape-shifting huli jing.

shows.title: The Dump
shows.description: Ugly Dave calls the garbage dump home, and he's not about to let some city slicker take it away from him.

shows.title: Shape-Shifters
shows.description: Deep in Afghanistan, two Marines with supernatural powers face a threat from one of their own kind.

shows.title: Helping Hand
shows.description: Stranded in orbit, an astronaut must choose between life and limb before her oxygen runs out.

shows.title: Fish Night
shows.description: After their car breaks down in the desert, two salesmen take a dreamlike voyage to the dawn of time.

shows.title: Lucky 13
shows.description: After the drop-ship Lucky 13 lost two crews, no pilot would fly her... but rookies don't get a choice.

shows.title: Zima Blue
shows.description: The renowned artist Zima recounts his mysterious past and rise to fame before unveiling his final work.

shows.title: Blind Spot
shows.description: A gang of cyborg thieves stage a high-speed heist of a heavily armored convoy.

shows.title: Ice Age
shows.description: A young couple moves into an apartment and finds a lost civilization inside their antique freezer.

shows.title: Alternate Histories
shows.description: Want to see Hitler die in a variety of comically fantastic ways? Now you can. Welcome to Multiversity!

shows.title: The Secret War
shows.description: Elite units of the Red Army fight an unholy evil deep in the ancient forests of Siberia.
